comment:
/**
 * A utility class for working with containers and calculating their dimensions.
 *
 * @class ContainerHelper
 */
description: A utility class for working with containers and calculating their dimensions.
name: ContainerHelper

comment:
/**
	 * Finds the maximum and minimum X coordinates of the children within the container.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ContainerHelper.findMaxAndMinX
	 * @param {Container} cont - The container containing child objects.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the minimum and maximum X coordinates.
	 */
description: Finds the maximum and minimum X coordinates of the children within the container.
name: findMaxAndMinX

params.description: The container containing child objects.
params.name: cont

returns.description: An object containing the minimum and maximum X coordinates.

comment:
/**
	 * Finds the maximum and minimum Y coordinates of the children within the container.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ContainerHelper.findMaxAndMinY
	 * @param {Container} cont - The container containing child objects.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the minimum and maximum Y coordinates.
	 */
description: Finds the maximum and minimum Y coordinates of the children within the container.
name: findMaxAndMinY

params.description: The container containing child objects.
params.name: cont

returns.description: An object containing the minimum and maximum Y coordinates.

comment:
/**
 * A utility class for handling coordinate transformations and calculations.
 *
 * @class Coordinate
 */
description: A utility class for handling coordinate transformations and calculations.
name: Coordinate

comment:
/**
	 * Converts the scale of an object to local scale, accounting for parent transformations.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method Coordinate.toLocalScale
	 * @param {PIXI.DisplayObject} obj - The object whose scale to convert.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the local scale values and parent references.
	 */
description: Converts the scale of an object to local scale, accounting for parent transformations.
name: toLocalScale

params.description: The object whose scale to convert.
params.name: obj

returns.description: An object containing the local scale values and parent references.

comment:
/**
	 * Converts the scale of an object to global scale, accounting for parent transformations.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method Coordinate.toGlobalScale
	 * @param {PIXI.DisplayObject} obj - The object whose scale to convert.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the global scale values and parent references.
	 */
description: Converts the scale of an object to global scale, accounting for parent transformations.
name: toGlobalScale

params.description: The object whose scale to convert.
params.name: obj

returns.description: An object containing the global scale values and parent references.

comment:
/**
	 * Converts the rotation of an object to global rotation, accounting for parent transformations.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method Coordinate.toGlobalRotation
	 * @param {PIXI.DisplayObject} obj - The object whose rotation to convert.
	 * @returns {number} The global rotation value.
	 */
description: Converts the rotation of an object to global rotation, accounting for parent transformations.
name: toGlobalRotation

params.description: The object whose rotation to convert.
params.name: obj

comment:
/**
	 * Converts the rotation of an object to local rotation, accounting for parent transformations.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method Coordinate.toLocalRotation
	 * @param {PIXI.DisplayObject} obj - The object whose rotation to convert.
	 * @returns {number} The local rotation value.
	 */
description: Converts the rotation of an object to local rotation, accounting for parent transformations.
name: toLocalRotation

params.description: The object whose rotation to convert.
params.name: obj

comment:
/**
	 * Retrieves global positioning and dimensions data of an object within its parent hierarchy.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method Coordinate.getGlobalData
	 * @param {PIXI.DisplayObject} obj - The object whose data to retrieve.
	 * @param {number} [cX] - Custom X coordinate.
	 * @param {number} [cY] - Custom Y coordinate.
	 * @param {number} [cW] - Custom width.
	 * @param {number} [cH] - Custom height.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing global positioning and dimensions data.
	 */
description: Retrieves global positioning and dimensions data of an object within its parent hierarchy.
name: getGlobalData

params.description: The object whose data to retrieve.
params.name: obj

params.description: Custom X coordinate.
params.name: cX

params.description: Custom Y coordinate.
params.name: cY

params.description: Custom width.
params.name: cW

params.description: Custom height.
params.name: cH

returns.description: An object containing global positioning and dimensions data.

comment:
/**
	 * Retrieves local positioning and dimensions data of an object within its parent hierarchy.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method Coordinate.getLocalData
	 * @param {PIXI.DisplayObject} obj - The object whose data to retrieve.
	 * @param {number} [cX] - Custom X coordinate.
	 * @param {number} [cY] - Custom Y coordinate.
	 * @param {number} [cW] - Custom width.
	 * @param {number} [cH] - Custom height.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing local positioning and dimensions data.
	 */
description: Retrieves local positioning and dimensions data of an object within its parent hierarchy.
name: getLocalData

params.description: The object whose data to retrieve.
params.name: obj

params.description: Custom X coordinate.
params.name: cX

params.description: Custom Y coordinate.
params.name: cY

params.description: Custom width.
params.name: cW

params.description: Custom height.
params.name: cH

returns.description: An object containing local positioning and dimensions data.

comment:
/**
 * A utility class for handling resizing and positioning of game objects.
 *
 * @class ResizeHelper
 */
description: A utility class for handling resizing and positioning of game objects.
name: ResizeHelper

comment:
/**
	 * Sets the base width and height of a game object based on its type.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.setBaseWidthHeight
	 * @param {object} gameObject - The game object whose base width and height to set.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the base width and height values.
	 */
description: Sets the base width and height of a game object based on its type.
name: setBaseWidthHeight

params.description: The game object whose base width and height to set.
params.name: gameObject

returns.description: An object containing the base width and height values.

comment:
/**
	 * Calculates available space and positioning information for a game object.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.getSpace
	 * @param {object} gameObject - The game object for which to calculate space.
	 * @param {string} orientation - The orientation of the resize data (e.g., "horizontal" or "vertical").
	 * @returns {object} An object containing available space and positioning data.
	 */
description: Calculates available space and positioning information for a game object.
name: getSpace

params.description: The game object for which to calculate space.
params.name: gameObject

params.description: The orientation of the resize data (e.g., "horizontal" or "vertical").
params.name: orientation

returns.description: An object containing available space and positioning data.

comment:
/**
	 * Retrieves positioning and dimensions bounds of a game object.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.getBounds
	 * @param {object} gameObject - The game object for which to retrieve bounds.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the bounds data.
	 */
description: Retrieves positioning and dimensions bounds of a game object.
name: getBounds

params.description: The game object for which to retrieve bounds.
params.name: gameObject

returns.description: An object containing the bounds data.

comment:
/**
	 * Calculates scaling factors based on available space and resize data.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.getScale
	 * @param {object} gameObject - The game object for which to calculate scaling factors.
	 * @param {string} orientation - The orientation of the resize data (e.g., "horizontal" or "vertical").
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the scaling factors (x and y).
	 */
description: Calculates scaling factors based on available space and resize data.
name: getScale

params.description: The game object for which to calculate scaling factors.
params.name: gameObject

params.description: The orientation of the resize data (e.g., "horizontal" or "vertical").
params.name: orientation

returns.description: An object containing the scaling factors (x and y).

comment:
/**
	 * Calculates positioning based on available space and alignment data.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.getPosition
	 * @param {object} gameObject - The game object for which to calculate positioning.
	 * @param {string} orientation - The orientation of the resize data (e.g., "horizontal" or "vertical").
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the calculated position (x and y).
	 */
description: Calculates positioning based on available space and alignment data.
name: getPosition

params.description: The game object for which to calculate positioning.
params.name: gameObject

params.description: The orientation of the resize data (e.g., "horizontal" or "vertical").
params.name: orientation

returns.description: An object containing the calculated position (x and y).

comment:
/**
	 * Finds the maximum and minimum X positions among the children of a game object.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.findMaxAndMinX
	 * @param {object} obj - The game object whose children to analyze.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the minimum (min) and maximum (max) X positions.
	 */
description: Finds the maximum and minimum X positions among the children of a game object.
name: findMaxAndMinX

params.description: The game object whose children to analyze.
params.name: obj

returns.description: An object containing the minimum (min) and maximum (max) X positions.

comment:
/**
	 * Finds the maximum and minimum Y positions among the children of a game object.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.findMaxAndMinY
	 * @param {object} obj - The game object whose children to analyze.
	 * @returns {object} An object containing the minimum (min) and maximum (max) Y positions.
	 */
description: Finds the maximum and minimum Y positions among the children of a game object.
name: findMaxAndMinY

params.description: The game object whose children to analyze.
params.name: obj

returns.description: An object containing the minimum (min) and maximum (max) Y positions.

comment:

	 * Recalculates the bounds and dimensions of a container game object after resizing.
	 *
	 * @static
	 * @method ResizeHelper.recalculateContainerBounds
	 * @param {object} obj - The container game object to recalculate bounds for.
	 */
description: Recalculates the bounds and dimensions of a container game object after resizing.
name: recalculateContainerBounds

params.description: The container game object to recalculate bounds for.
params.name: obj
